pages.title: Core: Shock Orb
pages.text: The $(2)Shock Orb Projector Core$() is a $(6)charge-based$() core that generates and launches highly-destructive projectiles. The spheres of plasma produced by this core are saturated with anti-photons which immediately annihilate upon release. Any disturbance to the plasma field will trigger a detonation.

pages.title: Shock Orb Core
pages.text: Unfortunately, the weapon's full potential is somewhat hindered; when the plasma sphere collides with solid matter, a significant portion of its energy is attenuated by anti-photon absorption.
